Articles.Content: Has anyone made a mod to try and find life on planets? Or even like a branch of archeology if you do find past life if one existed on a planet? if not anyone one want to try that can?

DMagic made some science parts that look for biological stuff, and just like with stock science parts, you get different messages depending on where you run these experiments. Who knows, some destinations might report positive...

Apart from that, I don't think this has been done.

On 6/22/2017 at 0:26 AM, rich216 said:

Has anyone made a mod to try and find life on planets? Or even like a branch of archeology if you do find past life if one existed on a planet? if not anyone one want to try that can? 

I will consider it for programming.
